level.heading: MOBILE ROADWAY VENDING SITE PERMIT[COLON] ISSUANCE (ยง 24-514)

level.text: Upon the submission of a completed application, the DCRA Director shall issue a MRV Site Permit if:
A valid Vending Business License; or
A current receipt for payment of all relevant Vending Business fees;
The applicant provides a Clean Hands Certification; and
The applicant has paid all the required fees.
The MRV Site Permit shall permit MRV vehicles to vend from legal parking spaces in public space.
A MRV Site Permit is issued only to the permittee and may not be sold, transferred, conveyed, or otherwise assigned to any other person.
